00031 RainbruRPG::Core::vcConstant::vcConstant()
00032                              :VelocityCalculator(){
00033 
00034   LOGI("Creation vcConstant");
00035 
00036 }
00037 
00050 float RainbruRPG::Core::vcConstant::getNextFrame(bool& b){
00051   if (!mRunning){
00052     LOGW("VelocityCalculator not started");
00053     return 0.0f;
00054   }
00055   else{
00056     unsigned long curentTime, timeEllapsed;
00057     float trans;
00058 
00059     curentTime=timer->getMilliseconds();
00060     timeEllapsed=curentTime-lastFrameTimeLine;
00061     trans=getLenghtByTime(curentTime)-getLenghtByTime(lastFrameTimeLine);
00062     lastFrameTimeLine=curentTime;
00063 
00064     // Set the transition to be ended if transitiontime exeeced
00065     if (curentTime>=transitionTime){
00066       b=false;
00067       LOGI("Transition ended");
00068     }
00069     return trans;
00070   }
00071 }
00072 
00083 float RainbruRPG::Core::vcConstant::getLenghtByTime(double d){
00084   if (transitionTime==0){
00085     LOGW("transitionTime=0");
00086   }
00087   else if (translationLenght==0){
00088     LOGW("transitionLenght=0");
00089   }
00090 
00091   return (translationLenght*d)/(transitionTime);
00092 }
